summary: The Saab JAS 39 Gripen is a single-engine fighter jet made by Saab AB in Sweden. It has a unique wing design and advanced controls. The Gripen replaced older planes in the Swedish Air Force and can do multiple jobs like fighting, attacking, and reconnaissance. It first flew in 1988 and officially joined the air force in 1996. Later models have more powerful engines, bigger weapon capacity, and improved technology. These newer versions are used by Sweden and Brazil. The Gripen has been sold to several countries, but there were some concerns about bribery during the sales process.
title: Saab JAS 39 Gripen
